title._content: Image taken from page 115 of 'In Praise of Tweed. [An anthology of prose and verse by various authors. Compiled, with an introduction and biographical notes by W. S. Crockett. With portraits.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "In Praise of Tweed. [An anthology of prose and verse by various authors. Compiled, with an introduction and biographical notes by W. S. Crockett. With portraits.]" Author: CROCKETT, William Shillinglaw. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11621.e.33." Page: 115 Place of Publishing: Selkirk Date of Publishing: 1899 Publisher: James Lewis Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000821707 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
